== Aufruf == 
{{Template:Ort|Name={{FULLPAGENAME}}|Alternativnamen={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?Alternativnamen|link=none}}|getty_id={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?getty_id|link=none}}|viaf_id={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?viaf_id|link=none}}|wikidata_id={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?wikidata_id|link=none}}|getty_coordinates={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?getty_coordinates|link=none}}}}
== Beispiele ==
{| class="wikitable" |- class="head" !colspan="2"| Name |- | Alternativnamen{{#info:F체r {{{Name}}} werden diese Alternativnamen verwendet}} | asd, fgh |- class="subhead" |colspan="2" | Normdaten |- | GND{{#info:Gemeinsame Normdatei}} | 1 |- | VIAF{{#info:Virtual International Authority File}} | 2 |- | Wikidata | 3 |- class="subhead" |colspan="2"| Lokalisierung |- | Koordinaten{{#info:Koordinaten via Getty Thesaurus of Geographical Names}} | 00째,00째 |- !colspan="2px" class="map"| MAP |} [[Category:Templates]]
{| class="wikitable" |- class="head {{{class}}}" !colspan="2"| {{{Name}}} [[Datei:Geographie ohne Rahmen.png|50px]] |- {{#if:{{{Alternativnamen|}}} | {{!}} Alternativnamen{{#info:F체r {{{Name}}} werden diese Alternativnamen verwendet}} {{!}} {{{Alternativnamen}}} }} |- {{#if:{{{Typ|}}} | {{!}} Typ {{!}} {{{Typ}}} }} |- {{#if:{{{getty_id|}}}{{{viaf_id|}}}{{{wikidata_id|}}} | {{!}}colspan="2" class="subhead" {{!}} Normdaten }} |- {{#if:{{{getty_id|}}} | {{!}} Getty TGN{{#info:Getty Thesaurus of Geographical Names}} {{!}} [http://vocab.getty.edu/page/tgn/{{{getty_id}}} {{{getty_id}}}] }} |- {{#if:{{{viaf_id|}}}| {{!}} VIAF{{#info:Virtual International Authority File}} {{!}} [https://viaf.org/viaf/{{{viaf_id}}} {{{viaf_id}}}] }} |- {{#if:{{{wikidata_id|}}} | {{!}} Wikidata {{!}} [https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/{{{wikidata_id}}} {{{wikidata_id}}}] }} |- {{#if:{{{getty_coordinates|}}} | {{!}}colspan="2" class="subhead" {{!}} Lokalisierung {{!}}- {{!}} Koordinaten{{#info:Koordinaten via Getty Thesaurus of Geographical Names}} {{!}} {{{getty_coordinates}}} {{!}}- !colspan="2px" class="map" {{!}} {{Template:LocationMap | Koordinaten={{{getty_coordinates}}} }} }} |}
